text.name: info4
text.text: PICO-8 is a fantastic console for creating

text.text.de: PICO-8 ist eine fantastische Konsole zum Erstellen
text.text.es: PICO-8 es una consola fantástica para crear

text.name: info5
text.text: share and play small games and other computer programs.

text.name: info6
text.text: Built-in features: Lua code editor, tools.

text.name: info7
text.text: for creating sprites and maps, as well as a musical editor.
